text:
Test Coronavirus Vaccine On Senior Government Officials First, Kenyan Politician Says | Sahara Reporters 
She said if the Ministry of Health says Kenya was ready for the testing process, then the top government officials should be first in line.
READ MORE: https://t.co/F9t5dANyzD https://t.co/mkls9bfOOU
